mapper.select: SELECT qna.qna_no, qna.question_date, qna.title, qna.type, qna.user_id, qna.content, item.name,item.item_no, qna.reply, qna.reply_date,qna.qna_img, qna.replyState FROM qna INNER JOIN item ON qna.item_no = item.item_no WHERE item.item_no=#{item_no} ORDER BY qna_no DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, 10
SELECT count(*) FROM qna INNER JOIN item ON qna.item_no = item.item_no WHERE item.item_no=#{item_no}

SELECT qna.qna_no, qna.question_date, qna.title, qna.type, qna.user_id, qna.content, item.name,item.item_no, qna.reply, qna.reply_date,qna.qna_img FROM qna INNER JOIN item ON qna.item_no = item.item_no WHERE qna.qna_no = #{qna_no}
